Test Name: Reanalysis of Acute Myeloid Leukemia (AML) 4- or 11-Gene Panels with Additional Genes
Purpose: To reanalyse previously collected AML gene panel samples using NGS to identify additional mutations not included in the original panels.
Container: DNA storage microcentrifuge tube or cryovial
Equipment: Next-Generation Sequencing platform with validated library prep kits and bioinformatics software
